iati-activity.title: WaterAid Nigeria
iati-activity.description: WaterAid Nigeria currently works in over 100 communities in Bauchi, Benue, Ekiti, Enugu, Jigawa and Plateau states, assisting the water and sanitation units (WASUs) of local government councils and NGO partners to deliver water and sanitation services to the poor. Besides helping communities to establish safe water supplies and latrines, WaterAid and the WASUs promote good hygiene and sanitation behaviour, such as hand washing at critical times and the proper use and maintenance of latrines.
iati-activity.participating-org: Small Town Water Supply and Sanitation Agency
